content:
That's wonderful! Congratulations to your niece on her graduation and academic achievements! It's great that you're proud of her, and I'm sure she appreciates the support and encouragement.

Entering May 25th as the issue date for now is a good idea. You can always update it later if needed, and it's better to have the certification listed on your profile with the completion date rather than waiting until you receive the physical certificate.

Now, let's get back to your LinkedIn profile. Have you considered adding any relevant skills or endorsements to your profile to complement your new certification?
